arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Lyon 2-0 Basel: OL mantain their perfect start in Europe
arts.sum: UEFA Europa League, Round 3, 23/10/25 After two consecutive defeats, Lyon returned to winning ways with a 1-0 victory against Basel in the UEFA Europa League. Goals from Corentin Tolisso…

arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Basel: Paulo Fonseca to switch formation?
arts.sum: Following back-to-back defeats in Ligue 1, Paulo Fonseca could have a rethink as his Olympique Lyonnais side host FC Basel on Thursday evening. L’Équipe understands that Lyon could play with two…
